Arizona Winter School 2010: Number theory and Dynamics

The 2010 Arizona Winter School was held from March 13-17, 2010, at the University of Arizona in Tucson, AZ.

  • Click here to register and/or apply for funding
    Registration is open to all. The application deadline for students seeking funding or wishing to participate in a student project is January 11, 2010. The project descriptions should be available after December 15.
  • Schedule and other important information.
  • Organizers
    • Main program: Matt Papanikolas, Dinesh Thakur
    • Other: Rachel Pries, Fernando Rodriguez-Villegas, and David Savitt
  • Wiki
